mappings.title: Ensure ESXi is properly patched
mappings.description: Ensure the latest ESXi patches are installed to protect against known vulnerabilities.

mappings.title: Ensure the Image Profile VIB acceptance level is configured properly
mappings.description: Ensure only signed VIBs are installed on the host.

mappings.title: Ensure NTP time synchronization is configured properly
mappings.description: Configure NTP for accurate time synchronization.

mappings.title: Ensure the ESXi host firewall is configured to restrict access to services
mappings.description: Configure firewall rules to restrict access to management services.

mappings.title: Ensure Managed Object Browser (MOB) is disabled
mappings.description: Disable the Managed Object Browser to prevent unauthorized API access.

mappings.title: Ensure a centralized location is configured to collect ESXi host core dumps
mappings.description: Configure network core dump collection for troubleshooting.

mappings.title: Ensure remote logging is configured for ESXi hosts
mappings.description: Configure remote syslog server for centralized logging.

mappings.title: Ensure a non-root user account exists for local admin access
mappings.description: Create non-root accounts for administration.

mappings.title: Ensure passwords are required to be complex
mappings.description: Configure password complexity requirements.

mappings.title: Ensure the maximum failed login attempts is set to 5
mappings.description: Configure account lockout after failed login attempts.

mappings.title: Ensure account lockout is set to 15 minutes
mappings.description: Configure account lockout duration.

mappings.title: Ensure the DCUI timeout is set to 600 seconds or less
mappings.description: Configure DCUI session timeout.

mappings.title: Ensure the ESXi shell is disabled
mappings.description: Disable ESXi Shell unless needed for troubleshooting.

mappings.title: Ensure SSH is disabled
mappings.description: Disable SSH unless needed for troubleshooting.

mappings.title: Ensure the CIM account access is limited
mappings.description: Restrict CIM account access.

mappings.title: Ensure Normal Lockdown mode is enabled
mappings.description: Enable lockdown mode to restrict direct host access.

mappings.title: Ensure the ESXi Shell interactive timeout is set to 300 seconds or less
mappings.description: Configure shell session timeout.

mappings.title: Ensure the ESXi Shell timeout is set to 300 seconds or less
mappings.description: Configure shell availability timeout.

mappings.title: Ensure bidirectional CHAP authentication for iSCSI traffic is enabled
mappings.description: Enable CHAP authentication for iSCSI.

mappings.title: Ensure the dvPortgroup Promiscuous Mode policy is set to reject
finding_titles: Promiscuous Mode Enabled on Port Group
mappings.description: Disable promiscuous mode on virtual switches.

mappings.title: Ensure the dvPortgroup MAC Address Change policy is set to reject
finding_titles: MAC Address Changes Allowed on vSwitch
mappings.description: Reject MAC address changes on virtual switches.

mappings.title: Ensure the dvPortgroup Forged Transmits policy is set to reject
mappings.description: Reject forged transmits on virtual switches.

mappings.title: Ensure informational messages from the VM to the VMX file are limited
mappings.description: Limit VM log file information exposure.

mappings.title: Ensure unnecessary floppy devices are disconnected
mappings.description: Remove or disconnect unnecessary devices.

mappings.title: Ensure unnecessary CD/DVD devices are disconnected
mappings.description: Remove or disconnect unnecessary devices.

mappings.title: Ensure unnecessary parallel ports are disconnected
mappings.description: Remove or disconnect unnecessary devices.

mappings.title: Ensure unnecessary serial ports are disconnected
mappings.description: Remove or disconnect unnecessary devices.

mappings.title: Ensure unnecessary USB devices are disconnected
mappings.description: Remove or disconnect unnecessary devices.

mappings.title: Ensure copy operations are disabled
mappings.description: Disable copy operations between guest and host.

mappings.title: Ensure paste operations are disabled
mappings.description: Disable paste operations between guest and host.

mappings.title: Ensure disk shrinking is disabled
mappings.description: Disable disk shrinking to prevent DoS.

mappings.title: Ensure disk wiping is disabled
mappings.description: Disable disk wiping to prevent DoS.

mappings.title: Ensure VIX messages from the VM are disabled
mappings.description: Disable VIX messaging to limit information exposure.

mappings.title: Ensure independent, non-persistent disks are not used
mappings.description: Avoid independent disks that bypass snapshots.

mappings.title: Ensure virtual machines have hardware version 14 or later
mappings.description: Use current hardware versions for security features.

mappings.title: Ensure VM console connections are limited
mappings.description: Limit remote console connections.

mappings.title: Ensure VMware Tools is installed and running
mappings.description: Keep VMware Tools installed and updated.

mappings.title: Ensure host information is not sent to guests
mappings.description: Disable host information exposure to VMs.
